name: Out of This Small World
body:
![flippers.png](ludum-dare/38/out-of-this-small-world/images/8f1.png)

**Out of This Small World** is a puzzle game, where you're on a small planet.
You must use the curvature of the planet to your advantage! (hint: the map loops on itself).
Step through the portal and get Out of This Small World (just to find another one behind the portal).

## Download:
* **Windows:** https://github.com/bradur/LD38/releases/download/1.0/OutofThisSmallWorld_win.zip
* **Max OSX:** https://github.com/bradur/LD38/releases/download/1.0/OutofThisSmallWorld_mac.zip
* **Linux:** https://github.com/bradur/LD38/releases/download/1.0/OutofThisSmallWorld_linux.zip

*Only the Windows version has been tested*

*Meant to be run at a 16:9 resolution*

## Keys:

- Arrow Keys: Move
- Esc: Open menu
- (hold) Right Shift: Sprint while moving forward
- Space: Chop tree (when equipped with an axe and targeting a tree)
- Right Ctrl: Unlock a door (when equipped with a key and targeting a door)
- F1: Toggle info
- P: Mute audio

## Tips:

- Some switches only work once, some work endlessly
- Axes are poorly made. They can only withstand chopping down one tree before they break!
- If you have flippers you can walk on water (no time to implement swimming animation!).

## Bugs:

- The looping world was implemented very poorly. Bugs related to that are bound to happen.
- Sometimes a tree just won't go down. Restarting the level should do the trick! (Esc and Q).

## More screenshots
![yellowkey.png](ludum-dare/38/out-of-this-small-world/images/8ed.png)
![screen_1492988936.05.png](ludum-dare/38/out-of-this-small-world/images/8ea.png)

## Links
* **TWITTER:** https://twitter.com/bradurdung
* **SOURCE CODE:** https://github.com/bradur/LD38

comments.body:
Fun game. The idea is nice, but the constant rotation is highly irritating. Maybe I'm getting old :)

I had the bug, where a tree wouldn't vanish after being chopped.

comments.body:
I like this. I didn't have a problem with the rotation but I can understand that some might. I didn't like the fact that after teleporting I lost all my inventory - it seems a little unfair that I had to find flippers again!? Perhaps it's like The Terminator and only living flesh can teleport? :grinning:

I like the music - it fits the game well. Nice work.

event.name: Ludum Dare 38
event.body:
Celebrating **15 years** of Ludum Dare! :cake:

Join us for our **38th** major Ludum Dare event. We're sticking to the classic Ludum Dare rules you all know and love, with a **72 hour Jam** and **48 hour Compo**. But this time, we're doing it with some brand new custom software. The software is still very-much alpha quality, but it _should_ be usable. :sweat_smile:

Follow the **[/news](/news)** for the latest updates on the event.

* :closed_book: **Rules:** [/ludum-dare/rules](/events/ludum-dare/rules)
* :green_book: **Game Hosting Guide:** [/ludum-dare/hosting-guide](/events/ludum-dare/hosting-guide)
* :earth_americas: **Real World Gatherings:** [ludumdare.com/../real-world-gatherings](http://ludumdare.com/compo/2017/04/04/real-world-gatherings-for-ludum-dare-38-placeholder/)
